subject: ant or maven
msgSnippet: Hi all; I have a question about running junit tests with a build tool. Some people say maven is the best choise to use with junit and some say ant is the best
messageBody:
Hi all;

I have a question about running junit tests with a build tool. Some people say maven is the best choise to use with junit and some say ant is the best for that. But I there is no real metric about the performance.

So what is your choice about the build tools. I will be very pleased if you share your expreince about the test run time,perfomance,plugins etc..

Yours.
